title: .925 Sterling Silver Miracle Set Diamond Infinity Hearts Adjustable Bracelet
item_description:
.925 Sterling Silver Miracle Set Diamond Infinity Hearts Adjustable Bracelet
Express your affection to her with this dazzling bolo bracelet. Elegant and timeless, this gorgeous .925 sterling silver bracelet features open heart shaped links with infinity loops woven around each heart. Each link has petite diamonds lining one curve of the infinity loop with a single diamond in the center of the loop in a miracle-plate setting. The unique miracle-plate setting centers each genuine diamond in a mirror-finish, high-polish frame, giving the illusion of a much larger stone. The row of heart links sit between two lengths of wheat chain. The bracelet features a secure slider that allows this bracelet to adjust from 6”-9”. This authentic design is crafted of real 92.5% sterling silver that has been electro-coated with genuine rhodium or 10K yellow gold, ensuring it will keep a tarnish-free shine for years to come. This sweet lariat style bracelet makes a perfect gift for any occasion. It's a classic and feminine piece she'll want to show off every day.

Sizing Guide
About Us
Haus of Brilliance was founded by our grandfather, who started from humble beginnings as a rough diamond sorter, then mastered the craft of stone cutting and polishing. He began searching for the very best sources of rough diamonds, from Bombay to Israel to Belgium, faceting and polishing the stones himself. Soon, he had a following of loyal customers, and a business was born!

The company grew, and our grandfather opened offices in the heart of New York City’s “Diamond District.” He passed down his keen eye and dedicated work ethic to his sons, who joined the business and expanded into manufacturing and selling finished jewelry, with diamonds still the focus.

Fast forward to today! We, the founder’s grandchildren, are stepping into the family business over 5 decades after it all began. With training in gemology and apprenticeships in jewelry manufacture, we are dedicated to carrying our grandfather’s legacy of artisanship forward into the future.

We are proud to bring you our fine jewelry collections. Every stone is meticulously chosen, and expertly cut and polished to bring you the optimal balance of breathtaking sparkle and superb value. Our jewelry is carefully designed, and made by hand, by real people – skilled artisans who have polished their craft over a lifetime, who are valued employees who have been with our company for decades.

Brilliant pieces at no additional mark-up, we hope to introduce you to that fine jewelry piece that will be passed on in your family for decades to come. Jewels are forever – trust us, we know!

title: 1/6 Carat Diamond Rondelle Graduated Ball Bead Cuff Bangle Silver Bracelet 7.5"
item_description:
1/6 Carat Diamond Rondelle Graduated Ball Bead Cuff Bangle Silver Bracelet 7.5"
This gorgeous .925 sterling silver cuff bangle bracelet features 0.15 carat total weight of round, brilliant cut diamonds with 75 stones in all. The bangle features sterling silver rondelle beads that are largest in the center and become smaller towards the outside of the bangle. The beads graduate in size and come together in the middle with a large diamond studded bead. Polished to a brilliant shine, this 7-inch circumference cuff bangle sits comfortably on your wrist without the hassle of any closing mechanisms. The cuff has some flexibility to adjust for different wrist sizes. This authentic design is crafted of real 92.5% sterling silver that has been electro-coated with genuine rhodium (a platinum-family metal), ensuring it will keep a tarnish-free shine for years to come. This classic cuff makes a great gift for any special occasion! Diamonds are thought to give the wearer clarity and illuminate solutions to life’s problems. Give her a gift that will perfectly complement her favorite ensemble.

title: Yellow Gold Plated Sterling Silver 1/2 ct Diamond Sideways Hearts Bolo Bracelet
item_description:
Yellow Gold Plated Sterling Silver 1/2 ct Diamond Sideways Hearts Bolo Bracelet
This sweet and stylish bolo bracelet is a feminine look that will draw choruses of "oohs," "ahhs," and "awws." This charming piece is crafted of yellow plated .925 sterling silver and features a row of tumbling sideways heart silhouettes with clusters of round, pave-set diamonds. These dainty, sparkling diamonds total 1/2 cttw with an approximate H-I Color and I1-I2 Clarity. The sliding bolo clasp of this bracelet means it is 4”-10” adjustable to suit your sizing needs.

title: 2-Pin 2.84mm USB Data Charging Cable Universal Magnetic Charger for Smart Watch
item_description:
2-Pin 2.84mm USB Data Charging Cable Universal Magnetic Charger for Smart Watch
🚚 BRAND NEW - SHIPS SAME DAY FROM US 🚛
 Product advantages:
1. Adsorption charging: 2-pin 2.84mm spacing with adsorption charging, making it convenient, safe, and fast for you to use.
2. Applicable products: The charging cable is suitable for 2-pin 2.84 pitch adsorption charging smartwatches and children's watches.
3. Authentic Material: The charging cable is composed of gold-plated pure copper needles and high-strength suction heads.
4. Five fold safety protection: The charging cable has five fold safety protection, which is more reliable. Zinc alloy material is leak proof, rust free, and easy to insert and remove.
5. High quality wires: Carefully selected TEP material, charging wires have explosion-proof and non thermal high-quality wires.
6.Scope of application: wearable devices, smart positioning devices, children's smart wristbands, smartwatches, wearable phones, Bluetooth earphones.
Number of branch connectors: single head
Product Description:
【2-pin magnetic charger cable】 The smartwatch charging cable comes with a magnetic port, making it difficult to pull out from the charging point during charging and not loose. As a backup charging cable, this is a good choice.
【Widely used】 The charging cable can be used for intelligent positioning devices, such as children's smart wristbands, smartwatches, Bluetooth earphones, etc.
【Durable and High Quality】 Made of high-quality wires; Ensure that your device provides an excellent charging experience. Durable high-quality TEP+Copper gold-plated material and copper wire ensure stable current transmission and charging quality
【Fast charging and stable performance】 You can connect power adapters, car adapters, mobile power supplies, laptops, etc. These charging methods can provide you with an efficient and highly stable charging experience.
【Compact and lightweight】 Convenient to carry when going out. Simultaneously providing fast and stable charging speed. Attention: Please charge the smartwatch before running out of battery power.
Be Applicable:
For Huawei Smart Watches
For Xiaomi haylou solar LS05 smart watch
For SONY smart watch
For Smart Bracelets
For Children's Phone Watches
For Mofi Cups
For Juicers
For Thermos Cups etc.
Package Includes:
1 x USB charging cable
Notes:
1. Due to manual measurement, please allow 0-1mm error. Make sure you don't mind before bidding.
2. Please confirm whether the interface you need is suitable for your watch or bracelet before purchasing.
3.After receiving the package, please contact us first if you encounter any problems, do not file disputes or bad comments before contacting us.

title: Round-Cut Diamond X & Tapered Bar Miracle-Set Bolo Bracelet in Sterling Silver
item_description:
Round-Cut Diamond X & Tapered Bar Miracle-Set Bolo Bracelet in Sterling Silver
Flawlessly infuse a sophisticated accessory to your daily ensemble with our Sterling Silver Rose-Cut Diamond Bolo Bracelet. Crafted from fine .925 sterling silver with a bracelet that can stretch from 6" to 9” in length, this dazzling diamond tennis-style bracelet features 25 rose-cut diamonds equally segmented on each silver plate. Interconnected via matching x detailing, its delectable polished silver finish makes it a visually appealing jewelry. With a secure slider that allows the bracelet to be adjusted to comfortably fit around your wrist, this stunning silver bolo bracelet will make a great gift to commemorate any special occasion. Please note, the diamonds are natural, rose-cut, IJ color, and I3 clarity, which puts them at the lower end of the diamond color and clarity grading scale. Rose-cut, promo quality diamonds are milky and cloudy in nature. They have an asymmetrical ball shape and are filled with inclusions. Bracelet features secure slider and can adjust from 6" to 9" length for a custom fit

item_description:
1/10 Carat Real Diamond Link Bracelet in 10k Yellow Gold Plated Sterling Silver
Elegant and timeless, this gorgeous .925 sterling silver bolo bracelet features 0.1 carat total weight of round, rose cut, promo quality diamonds with a whopping 24 stones in all. Rose-cut, promo quality diamonds are milky and cloudy in nature. The bolo bracelet features a length of alternating X-links and heart shaped links filled with diamonds between lengths of rope chain. The bracelet features a secure slider that allows this bracelet to adjust from 6”-9”. This authentic design is crafted of real 92.5% sterling silver that has been electro-coated with your choice of genuine rhodium (a platinum-family metal) or 10K yellow gold, ensuring it will keep a tarnish-free shine for years to come. This sweet lariat style bracelet makes a perfect gift for any occasion. It's a classic and feminine piece she'll want to show off every day. Give her a gift that will perfectly complement her favorite ensemble.

Sizing Guide
About Us
Haus of Brilliance was founded by our grandfather, who started from humble beginnings as a rough diamond sorter, then mastered the craft of stone cutting and polishing. He began searching for the very best sources of rough diamonds, from Bombay to Israel to Belgium, faceting and polishing the stones himself. Soon, he had a following of loyal customers, and a business was born!

The company grew, and our grandfather opened offices in the heart of New York City’s “Diamond District.” He passed down his keen eye and dedicated work ethic to his sons, who joined the business and expanded into manufacturing and selling finished jewelry, with diamonds still the focus.

Fast forward to today! We, the founder’s grandchildren, are stepping into the family business over 5 decades after it all began. With training in gemology and apprenticeships in jewelry manufacture, we are dedicated to carrying our grandfather’s legacy of artisanship forward into the future.

We are proud to bring you our fine jewelry collections. Every stone is meticulously chosen, and expertly cut and polished to bring you the optimal balance of breathtaking sparkle and superb value. Our jewelry is carefully designed, and made by hand, by real people – skilled artisans who have polished their craft over a lifetime, who are valued employees who have been with our company for decades.

Brilliant pieces at no additional mark-up, we hope to introduce you to that fine jewelry piece that will be passed on in your family for decades to come. Jewels are forever – trust us, we know!

title: 6-9 10K Yellow Gold Diamond Accented Hearts Bolo Bracelet in Sterling Silver
item_description:
6-9 10K Yellow Gold Diamond Accented Hearts Bolo Bracelet in Sterling Silver
Express your affection to her with this dazzling bolo bracelet. Elegant and timeless, this gorgeous .925 sterling silver bracelet features a row of six open heart links with petite diamonds lining alternating sides of each heart. The row of heart links sit between two lengths of wheat chain. The bracelet features a secure slider that allows this bracelet to adjust from 6”-9”. This authentic design is crafted of real 92.5% sterling silver that has been electro-coated with genuine rhodium or 10K yellow gold, ensuring it will keep a tarnish-free shine for years to come. This sweet lariat style bracelet makes a perfect gift for any occasion. It's a classic and feminine piece she'll want to show off every day.

title: 1/10 Carat Real Diamond Wave Bracelet in 14K Yellow Gold Plated Sterling Silver
item_description:
1/10 Carat Real Diamond Wave Bracelet in 14K Yellow Gold Plated Sterling Silver
Certain to create a sophisticated look with any attire, this stylish diamond bolo bracelet is composed of 14k yellow gold plated .925 sterling silver. It features an alternating pattern of infinity links and a double heart links, one embellished with round-cut diamonds and the other crafted in yellow gold. Polished high to shine, the bolo clasp allows the chain bracelet to adjust easily on the wrist. Bracelet features secure slider and can adjust from 4" to 10" length for a custom fit

title: 1/4 Carat Diamond Rondelle Ball Bead Cuff Bangle Bracelet in Sterling Silver
item_description:
1/4 Carat Diamond Rondelle Ball Bead Cuff Bangle Bracelet in Sterling Silver
This gorgeous .925 sterling silver cuff bangle bracelet features 0.25 carat total weight of round, brilliant cut diamonds with 90 stones in all. The bangle features sterling silver rondelle beads that are largest in the center and become smaller towards the outside of the bangle. There are rows of channel set diamonds between the rondelle beads. Polished to a brilliant shine, this 7-inch circumference cuff bangle sits comfortably on your wrist without the hassle of any closing mechanisms. The cuff has some flexibility to adjust for different wrist sizes. This authentic design is crafted of real 92.5% sterling silver that has been electro-coated with genuine rhodium (a platinum-family metal), ensuring it will keep a tarnish-free shine for years to come. This classic cuff makes a great gift for any special occasion! Diamonds are thought to give the wearer clarity and illuminate solutions to life’s problems. Give her a gift that will perfectly complement her favorite ensemble.

title: 14K Rose Gold Plated .925 Sterling Silver Diamond Accent & Heart Links Bracelet
item_description:
14K Rose Gold Plated .925 Sterling Silver Diamond Accent & Heart Links Bracelet
Equal parts sweet and elegant, the bracelet comprises an array of details that make it extra special. The 14K rose gold plated .925 Sterling Silver bolo chain is linked to six marquise shaped charms that are pavéd with natural round diamonds, totaling up to 1/10 cttw. Five cute heart-shaped accents are also added to the mix. It’s complete with a secure slider that can be adjusted for a custom fit from 6 to 9 inches

title: 4-10 Diamond Interlinking Triple Heart Bolo Tennis Bracelet in Sterling Silver
item_description:
4-10 Diamond Interlinking Triple Heart Bolo Tennis Bracelet in Sterling Silver
A symbol of your affection, this sparkling diamond heart bolo bracelet is the perfect gift for a special girl of any age. Crafted from cool weaves of .925 sterling silver, this dainty choice features three heart-outline links - touched with diamonds and beaded detailing - that alternate with circle links for a playful look. Glistening with 1/10 Cttw of diamonds and a brilliant buffed luster, this glimmering wheat chain bracelet adjusts up to 10.25 inches in length and secures with a bolo clasp and ball ends.
